name: START TWS01F
description:
Quick Connect Technology – Stable Bluetooth connection for smooth pairing with your smartphone or tablet.
Pure Bass Sound – High-quality drivers deliver deep bass and clear audio for music and calls.
Smart Touch Control – Control music playback, calls, and voice assistants with a simple touch.
Long Battery Life – Up to 4 hours of continuous playback on a single charge; the charging case extends usage 3–4 times.
Compact Charging Case – 250mAh case capacity keeps your earbuds powered on the go.
Comfortable In-Ear Fit – Lightweight ergonomic design for secure and comfortable wear all day.
Universal Compatibility – Works with iOS, Android, and other Bluetooth-enabled devices.

name: Microdigit 16GB Memory Card

This card is tested to be durable, so you can take it anywhere with the confidence that your photos, videos and other data will be protected. It can also be used in conjunction with another SD flash memory card adapter to match the standard SDHC/SDXC host equipment. name: Anker USB-C to Lightning Cable.
description:
This is a 1-meter cable designed for charging Apple devices.
The packaging indicates it supports Power Delivery (PD) with a 20W output.
The cable is compatible with iPhones and other Apple products that use a Lightning port.
The product is available for purchase from various electronics retailers and online stores.

name: X-FAST USB-C to C 35W Power Adapter
description:
Model: X-003
Power: 35W
Ports: It has a USB-C port and is designed for fast charging. 
Compatibility: The adapter is compatible with a wide range of devices, including iPhones, iPads, and other USB-powered devices

name: STEEL 65W fast charger adapter
description:
Power: It has a maximum output of 65W.
Technology: It utilizes GaN technology, which allows for a smaller, more efficient charger. 
Compatibility: It is compatible with various devices, including laptops, smartphones, and tablets from brands like Apple, Samsung, and others.

name: Samsung 25W PD (Power Delivery) USB-C adapter
description:
This wall charger provides Super Fast Charging at up to 25W for compatible devices. 
It is designed to be used with a USB-C to USB-C charging cable. 
The charger is available in both black and white. 
It is designed to be safe from overcurrent, short circuits, and high temperatures

name: 35W USB-C Power Adapter.
description:
It is a dual USB-C port compact power adapter that allows you to charge two devices at the same time. 
The adapter is compatible with any USB-C-enabled device, including iPhone, iPad, Apple Watch, AirPods, and MacBook Air. 
The compact size and folding pins make it easy to pack and store.

name: 35W USB-C Power Adapter, which is marketed for use with the iPhone
description:
The adapter is designed for fast charging and has a power output of 35W. 
It is compatible with devices that use a USB-C charging cable. 
The adapter's compact size and folding pins make it easy to pack and store.

name: Apple 20W USB-C Power Adapter.
description:
It is a wall charger that provides fast and efficient charging for compatible devices. 
It is compatible with any USB-C enabled device, but Apple recommends pairing it with the 11-inch iPad Pro and 12.9-inch iPad Pro (3rd generation) for optimal charging performance. 
It can charge an iPhone 8 or later up to 50% in about 35 minutes. 
The adapter is available in white. 
The charging cable is sold separately

name: HK10 Pro+ multi-functional smartwatch.
description:
Display: It features an AMOLED display with a 410 x 494 resolution. 
Features: The smartwatch includes a real compass, NFC access, AI ChatGPT integration, music playback, and an e-book reader. It also supports health tracking for heart rate, blood pressure, and sleep. 
Connectivity: The watch supports Bluetooth calling and can connect to TWS earbuds. 
Design: It has a sporty design and is rated IP68 for water resistance.

name: HK9 Ultra 2 Max smartwatch
description:
This smartwatch features a 2.12-inch AMOLED screen and 2GB of internal storage. 
It includes features like health monitoring (heart rate, blood oxygen), fitness tracking, and smart notifications. 
The watch supports Bluetooth 5.0 for connectivity and has an IP68 water-resistant rating. 
It also includes an AI-powered voice assistant and a ChatGPT feature.

name: T900 Ultra2 Big Smart Watch.
description:
t features a large 49mm or 2.19-inch infinite display. 
The smartwatch supports wireless charging and Bluetooth calling. 
It is compatible with both Android and iOS devices. 
The watch includes health monitoring features such as heart rate, blood pressure, and sleep tracking, as well as multiple sports modes. 
The battery can last up to 5 days on a full charge.

name: HK22 Ultra 2 smartwatch
description:
The watch features a high-resolution touchscreen, fitness tracking, heart rate monitoring, and smart notifications. 
It has Bluetooth 5.2 connectivity and supports making and answering calls. 
Some versions of the watch, such as the HK9 Ultra 2, include a 2.02-inch AMOLED screen, ChatGPT, and a compass. 
The watch is water-resistant and comes with interchangeable straps.

name: T1000 Ultra Smart Watch.
description:
It is a smartwatch with a 2.2-inch infinite full-touch display and wireless charging capabilities. 
The watch features health tracking for heart rate, blood pressure, oxygen levels, and sleep patterns. 
It has an IP68 waterproof rating and supports Bluetooth calling, allowing you to make and answer calls directly from the watch. 
It is compatible with both iOS and Android devices.

name: JSYES M70 Max Ultra 2 smartwatch.
description:
It is a smartwatch that supports calls, Chat GPT, and NFC. 
It comes with seven interchangeable straps. 
The watch has a large, clear touchscreen display. 
It includes advanced health and fitness tracking features like heart rate monitoring, blood pressure, and sleep tracking. 
The smartwatch is designed to be compatible with both iPhone and Android devices.

name: W&O Little Star X10 Ultra 3 smartwatch.
description:
It features a curved screen and wireless charging. 
The watch is compatible with both Android and iOS devices. 
It includes health tracking features such as heart rate monitoring, sleep tracking, and step counting. 
The watch has a built-in voice assistant and supports NFC for payments.

name: MJ-06 magnetic fill light. It is a mini RGB LED light
description:
It features RGB lighting and adjustable brightness. 
The light has a magnetic mounting system and can also be attached with a clip. 
It is rechargeable and has a built-in battery. 
The light is suitable for content creation, such as video shooting and vlogging.

name: K03 Clip Fill Light, a portable LED light
description:
The K03 Clip Fill Light is a clip-on light for mobile phones that features adjustable brightness and dimming control. 
It is designed for use in various scenarios, including selfies, video calls, live streaming, and makeup application. 
The product is available for purchase in Egypt from various retailers, with prices starting from approximately EGP 380. 
The light has a CCT (Correlated Color Temperature) feature, which allows for adjusting the color temperature between white and warm light.

name: K02 heart-shaped mobile phone camera fill light
description:
Design: Heart-shaped with a clip-on feature for easy attachment to a mobile phone.
Features: It has adjustable brightness and three light modes. 
Power: It is rechargeable for convenience on the go. 
Use: It provides additional illumination to reduce shadows and enhance the clarity of photos and videos.

name: K01 Mobile Phone Camera Fill Light.
description:
It has 3 adjustable brightness levels.
It features a long-lasting rechargeable battery.
It is suitable for mobile, camera, and high-quality video shooting.

name: AY-49 Video Making Kit. It is a vlogging kit designed for content creators to use with their smartphones
description:
The kit typically includes a microphone, an LED light, a mini tripod, and a phone holder. 
It is compatible with most smartphones and is suitable for various uses like vlogging, live streaming, and photography. 
The LED light has adjustable brightness, and the microphone is designed for clear audio capture. 
The tripod is versatile and can be used as a handheld grip or a stand. 
The kit is available for purchase from various online retailers.

name: Earldom power bank has a capacity of 20000 mAh.
description:
he power bank has a capacity of 20000 mAh.
It is a wired power bank with multiple ports.
The device features a digital display to show the remaining battery level.
The power bank is designed for fast charging.

name: PB-21 fast-charging power bank with a 30,000mAh capacity.
description:
It is a fast-charging power bank with a 30,000 mAh capacity. 
The power bank has a 2.4A output. 
It is equipped with multiple ports, including USB, Type-C, and Micro USB. 
The device has a built-in li-polymer battery.

description:
Capacity: 10000mAh
Output: 2.1A

Model Number: ET-PB64

name: K9 Wireless Microphone
description:
t offers plug-and-play functionality with automatic pairing, requiring no additional apps or software. 
The microphone is compatible with devices featuring Type-C and Lightning ports, including smartphones and tablets. 
It features intelligent noise reduction chips for clear recording and superior audio quality. 
The system allows for dual recording, capturing audio from two transmitters simultaneously. 
Each microphone provides up to 6 hours of continuous use on a full charge.

name: 13-inch LED Ring Light, model M-330.
description:
Provides soft, even, and shadow-free illumination, ideal for selfies, live streaming, and makeup tutorials. 
Features three color temperatures (cool, warm, and natural) and adjustable brightness levels. 
Designed to enhance facial features, soften skin, and minimize imperfections. 
Often comes with a tripod stand and a flexible phone holder for versatile use. 
The price can be around LKR 3,990.00 in some markets.

name: ESR HaloLock Mini Kickstand Wireless Power Bank
description:
Capacity: Typically available in 6,000 mAh or 10,000 mAh versions.
Compatibility: Features HaloLock technology for secure, automatic magnetic alignment with MagSafe-compatible iPhones (iPhone 12 series and later).
Charging Speeds: Offers up to 7.5 W wireless charging and supports 15W USB-C input and 12W USB-C output for wired charging.
Design: Includes a built-in, foldable kickstand that allows the phone to be propped up vertically or horizontally while charging.
Portability: Designed to be compact and lightweight for easy carrying.

name: DNIO AW003 32W Desktop Wireless Charger
description:
Wireless Charging: Offers up to 15W wireless charging power.

name: Samsung 25W PD (Power Delivery) USB-C Adapter.
description:
This wall charger provides Super Fast Charging with USB-C PD 3.0 PPS at up to a maximum of 25W for compatible devices. 
It is compact and portable, making it convenient for travel. 
The charger is available in both black and white colors. 
It is designed to work with official Samsung Type-C to Type-C charging cables for optimal results.

name: Samsung 45W PD (Power Delivery) adapter
description:
This wall charger provides Super Fast Charging 2.0 with USB-C PD 3.0 PPS at up to a maximum of 45W for compatible devices. 
It is designed to charge a wide range of devices, from earbuds to tablets, at optimal speeds. 
The charger provides protection against hazards such as overcurrent, short circuits, and temperature fluctuations.

name: Samsung 45W PD Chargers
description:
Key Features: Delivers up to 45W output using Power Delivery (PD) 3.0 technology. 
Compatibility: Features a USB-C port and is designed to charge a wide range of Samsung Galaxy devices, from earbuds to tablets, at optimal speeds. 
Cable: Includes an extra-long 1.8m Type-C to Type-C cable that supports a high current of 5A. 
Safety: Built with advanced safety protections against hazards like overcurrent, short circuits, and temperature fluctuations.

name: Voltix 4-in-1 data cable
description:
It is a 4-in-1 convertible design with multiple connectors, including USB-A to C, USB-C to C, USB-C to Lightning, and USB-A to Lightning, making it compatible with a wide range of devices. 
The cable supports up to 65W power delivery for efficient charging of smartphones, tablets, and laptops. 
It features a durable, nylon-braided material that enhances longevity and resists fraying.

name: Dolphin S61V USB to Micro
description:
The cable supports fast charging up to 2.4A.

name: original Oppo 65W SuperVOOC chargers
description:
The charger provides ultra-fast charging speeds of 65W. 
It uses Oppo's proprietary VOOC flash charging technology, designed for fast charging without overheating. 
The technology is compatible with VOOC-supported phones and includes temperature control and safety features. 
Each package includes a wall adapter and a Type-C cable.

description:
It provides up to 80W charging power.

It is compatible with devices that support SuperVOOC fast charging.

It supports Power Delivery (PD), Qualcomm Quick Charge 3.0 (QC3.0), and Super VOOC fast charging technologies. 
The charger has a maximum power output of 45W.

The product is compatible with a wide range of smartphones and USB-powered devices.
